slimefun_essentials.title: Slimefun Essentials (SFE)
slimefun_essentials.config.option.block_:
-> Enables custom block textures (MBP required)
-> Enables Jade compatibility (Jade required)
*Requires SlimefunServerEssentials to be installed on the server*
slimefun_essentials.config.option.addons: Add or remove Slimefun Addons you want support for!
slimefun_essentials.config.option.hide_b:
Hides the tooltip of items meant just as background/filler
E.g. the grey glass panes in the Slimefun guide.
slimefun_essentials.config.option.requir:
If enabled SFE will only function on servers.
May require you to leave and rejoin the world/server to take effect.
slimefun_essentials.config.option.enable: Should Slimefun Essentials only function on whitelisted servers?
slimefun_essentials.config.option.server:
Add or remove server names you want whitelisted!
(There is also a button in the edit server screen)
slimefun_essentials.config.option.auto_t:
Should SFE automatically enable or disable addon support based on installed addons on the server?
*Requires SlimefunServerEssentials to be installed on the server*
slimefun_essentials.config.option.auto_m:
Should SFE automatically disable items based on the config on the server?
*Requires SlimefunServerEssentials to be installed on the server*
slimefun_essentials.server_menu.add_whit: Adds the server to the whitelist
slimefun_essentials.server_menu.remove_w: Removes the server from the whitelist
slimefun_essentials.recipes.label.day: This block must be exposed to the Sun to process this Recipe!
slimefun_essentials.recipes.label.night: This block must be exposed to the Moon to process this Recipe!
slimefun_essentials.guide.name: Slimefun Guide
slimefun_essentials.guide.landing_text: Welcome, to the world of Slimefun
